summary: Hated how you are forced to pick between a kitchen, an armory or a library for your east wing upgrade? In this little mod I made a little extra room to be used as an alternative library so that you can have your armory built on the east wing
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3pt]::::::::: My Other Mods ::::::::::[/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35521]Olivia Wilde - Housecarl Replacer[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34273]Namaofs Watchtower - A Player Home[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24684]UNP Clothing Merchants[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29633]Olivia Wilde - Standalone Follower[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26437]Angelina Jolie - Standalone Follower[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24421]Adult Toys Merchant - NSFW[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24894]Severus Jewelry Collection Merchant[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24559]SED7 Accessories and Piercings Merchant - NSFW[/url][/size][/b]


[b][size=2][color=yellow]:::::::::::::::::: What a hell is this ::::::::::::::::::[/size][/color][/b]
[b]This mod adds a library which can be accessed if you have built the little \"house/entrance\" of your hearthfire home so that you can have your armory (or kitchen) in the east wing without sacrificing all those pretty bookshelves for your wonderful book collection[/b]

[b][size=2][color=yellow]::::::::::::::::::: Why :::::::::::::::::::[/b][/size][/color]
[b]Well, personally I was really disappointed with Hearthfire, I thought it would allow me to customize whatever I wanted but it turned out that everything has a preset and you couldn\'t really customize as you please, you were given some very limited choices to pick from.

Why couldn\'t they allow us to place any of the 3 extra wings in whatever position we wanted instead of limiting us to pick between 3 essential rooms that are placed in the same spot -.- (for example I was hoping to have an armory room, a kitchen and a library but instead I had to pick 1 .. WTF)

Anyways, this is why I made this mod, I decided to pick the armory for the east wing, but I also collect books so I needed a library and used shezries kitchen addon, now my home is perfect

In the files section you will see 3 downloads, the same library for each of the hearthfire homes ..

All the libraries are fully navmeshed and follower friendly should you decide to leave your followers in it ..
[/b]


[b][size=2][color=yellow]::::::::::::::::: Installation Instructions ::::::::::::::::: [/b][/size][/color]
[b][size=4][color=red]*******IMPORTANT******* Before installing this mod, you must at least build the little \"House\" or \"Entrance\" and make sure it turned into a cell.[/color][/size][/b]
[b]1- Pick the file that matches the house you have (If you built Lakeview Manor then pick the Lakeview Library and so on)
2- Install this mod with NMM or manually (place the contents in the skyrim data folder)
3- Activate FM - Lakeview Library or ( FM - Windstad Library) or ( FM - Heljarchen Library )
4- I recommend to load my mod after any other mods that modifies the Hearthfire homes
5- Enjoy

I recommend that you checkout [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26016]Shezries Hearthfire Kitchens[/url] and use his kitchen along with my library, just make sure to load my mod after his[/b]


[b][size=2][color=yellow]::::::::::::::: Uninstalling ::::::::::::::: [/b][/size][/color]
[b]1- Take everything you have placed inside the library (all your books etc) 
2- Get out of the library and exit the house 
3- Save
4- Deactivate the mod
5- Done[/b]


[b][color=yellow]::::::::::::::: Credit :::::::::::::[/color][/b]
[b]Oaristys and Tony67 for their modder resources[/b]
[b]LeanderSeelenPuls for the German translation[/b] 


[b][color=yellow]::::::::::::: Permission ::::::::::::[/color][/b]
[b]Feel free to edit this mod for your PERSONAL use only, do not re-publish it or re-upload it anywhere else without my permission.[/b]
author: Foaman
